title: Mental Age Test
description: What's your true mental age? Find out with 12 questions!

questions.question: What activity do you most want to do on weekends?

choices.text: Learning new hobbies or going on adventures
Partying or hanging out with friends
Watching movies or reading at home

questions.question: What's your attitude toward new technology and trends?

choices.text: I learn and try it immediately
I try if others recommend it
I prefer what I'm familiar with

questions.question: When you're stressed, how do you cope?

choices.text: A cup of tea and a walk

questions.question: What's most important when spending money?
What's the first thing you do when you wake up?

choices.text: I refer to friends or social media opinions
I research thoroughly and compare options
I judge based on experience and wisdom

questions.question: At parties or gatherings, how are you?

choices.text: Being the life of the party
Having deep conversations with close friends

questions.question: How do you react when you make a mistake?

choices.text: I quickly forget and move on
I feel down briefly but recover
I analyze the cause and improve
Visiting trendy spots and taking photos

questions.question: What time do you go to bed?
What's the happiest moment of your day?

results.title: Teens (Age 15)
results.description: Your mental age is eternally youthful - the teens! You're full of curiosity and passion for new things. Trend-savvy and fun-seeking, you bring energy to everyone around you. You might be impulsive at times, but that pure energy is your charm.
results.advice: Try to make some plans for the future occasionally. With that passion, you can achieve anything!

results.title: Twenties (Age 25)
results.description: Your mental age is the peak of youth - the twenties! You're full of challenging spirit and ambition for the world. Growing through experiences and valuing relationships, you actively enjoy life.
results.advice: Passion is great, but sometimes you need to stop and reflect on yourself.

results.title: Thirties (Age 35)
results.description: Your mental age is the balanced thirties! Wisdom from experience harmonizes with ongoing vitality. Practical yet valuing quality of life, you know how to make wise choices.
results.advice: Rather than pursuing perfection, sometimes enjoying the moment is important too. Give yourself some slack.

results.title: Forties (Age 45)
results.description: Your mental age is the stability-seeking forties! You understand the essence of life and know how to focus on what truly matters. Making wise decisions from experience, you value inner peace.
results.advice: Keep your curiosity for new things alive. There's no age limit on learning.

results.title: Fifties and Beyond (Age 55+)
results.description: Your mental age is the seasoned fifties and beyond! With rich experience and deep insight, you're like a sage who has transcended life. Valuing health and peace over material things, you provide stability to those around you.
results.advice: Enjoy connecting with younger generations too. There's something to learn from each other.
